entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hudson Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hudson Bay 2:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -20.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -27.9°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
